definition: handsome/refined/elegant/graceful/superior/show (loanword)/CL:場|场[chang2]/(literary) to grow/to bloom/(of crops) to produce ears

sentences.english: I like to Explore the Beauty of China and Chinese culture and Traditions.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡探索中國的秀麗的河山和他的文化與傳統。

sentences.english: Wu Gorge, also known as Great Gorge to a beautiful deep said.
sentences.chinese: 巫峽又名大峽，以幽深秀麗著稱。

sentences.english: On their way to the campground, they enjoyed looking at the beautiful mountains and lakes.
sentences.chinese: 往露營地的一路上，他們飽覽了秀麗的湖光山色。

sentences.english: SiMing Lake has West Lake's beauty and Dong Ting Lake's pizzazz.
sentences.chinese: 四明湖，既有西湖的秀麗又有洞庭湖的瀟灑。

sentences.english: Among these four islands, there can be no doubt that South Island is the least polluted and most spectacularly scenic of them all.
sentences.chinese: 四個島中，南島無疑是污染最少且風景最秀麗的。

sentences.english: It is full of breath-taking landscape, ancient history, simple folkway , wonderful culture.
sentences.chinese: 可謂是風景秀麗，歷史古老，民風淳樸，文化燦爛。

sentences.english: Head office is located in the scenic southern bank of Qiantang River in Hangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 總公司座落於風景秀麗的杭州錢塘江南岸。

sentences.english: Beautiful scenery, is extremely advantageous geographical conditions, water and land transportation accessible.
sentences.chinese: 山水秀麗，地理條件十分優越，水陸交通四通八達。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of metal exposure on defecation behavior in nematode Caenorhabditis elegans.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究重金屬暴露對秀麗線蟲排泄行爲的影響。

sentences.english: Faustus summons Helen again and exclaims rapturously about her beauty.
sentences.chinese: 浮士德再度召喚海倫並震懾於她的秀麗。

sentences.english: His characters were exquisite yet vigorous and forceful.
sentences.chinese: 他的字秀麗優美而又剛勁有力。

sentences.english: Our company is located at the foot of the scenic Lushan of Ruichang .
sentences.chinese: 公司位於景色秀麗的廬山腳下瑞昌市。

sentences.english: I shall never forget the magnificence of the Swiss mountains and the beauty of the lakes.
sentences.chinese: 我永遠也不會忘記瑞士山嶽的壯美和湖泊的秀麗。

sentences.english: The island's chief feature was its beauty.
sentences.chinese: 這個島的主要特色是風景秀麗。

sentences.english: Solidtop sinks almost cover the entire range of Solidtop countertop colors.
sentences.chinese: 秀麗臺星盆系列包括了幾乎整個秀麗臺臺面色譜範圍。

sentences.english: Solidtop sinks almost cover the entire range of Solidtop countertop colors.
sentences.chinese: 秀麗臺星盆系列包括了幾乎整個秀麗臺臺面色譜範圍。

definition: lucid and elegant/quiet and exquisite/clear and attractive style
mien/bearing/grace/amorous feelings/flirtatious expressions/local conditions and customs/wind force, direction etc
simple and unadorned (of art, architecture etc)
